Row.Text: Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Stave Church and Longhouse in the same District. Ageless.[LI]{LOC_QUARTER_TRELLEBORG_TOOLTIP_TOWN}[LI]{LOC_QUARTER_TRELLEBORG_TOOLTIP_CITY}[/LIST]
Town: +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Rivers.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Grants a Great Work Slot. Grants a Great Work Slot. Grants a Great Work Slot. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for each adjacent Forest and Taiga Tile. Ageless.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every two adjacent Coastal Tiles.
Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Naust and Fishing Quay in the same District. Ageless.[LI]{LOC_QUARTER_LEIDANG_TOOLTIP_TOWN}[LI]{LOC_QUARTER_LEIDANG_TOOLTIP_CITY}[/LIST]
Town: +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Coast.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Resource. Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Ageless. Must be placed on an on Coast or Navigable River.
